item.description:
Let's head up to Lowell and take in a Spinners game who are a minor league team for the Red Sox.

I will need $15 paid up front to reserve seats.  I have a paypal account (mymeetupstuff@yahoo.com) or people can mail me checks.  I'll provide the address to those that want that option.

The party deck is now sold out for the year.  With 10 people we can do a Party Pack

Perfect for groups looking for a little bit of everything, the Spinners Party Pack provides each ticket holder with a box seat behind home plate, hot dog, ice cream and beverage! Packs, former Family 10 Packs, have a minimum ticket requirement of 10 people. Each member of your party will receive: 

  • Box seat ticket
  • Hot Dog, Ice Cream and Beverage
  • Game Program
  • Group name displayed on video board
  • Wait service throughout the game

Spinners Party Packs are just $14 per ticket

Spinners website:

 

http://www.milb.com/index.jsp?sid=t558 

 

RSVP'S ARE NOT FINAL UNTIL PAYMENT RECEIVED.
item.how_to_find_us: Will Update Gate Entrance when tickets reserved...
item.name: Lowell Spinners Game
